backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing the backend for a social app with user registration, profiles, contacts, messaging, and photo/video sharing, using access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report mapping implemented features (messaging, photo sharing, video sharing, AI image generation) to their relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of key frontend files including ProfilePage, ImageGenerator, VideoGenerator, CreatePage, and App.tsx.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines light/dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the ShareServe app that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with all app routes and an AuthGate that gates access behind Internet Identity login and user registration.
Reusable heading component that applies one of several neon/gradient animation variants using Tailwind utility classes and supports configurable HTML heading tags.
frontend/src/components/ImageGenerator.t: AI image generation UI component that simulates generation with a delay, displays a placeholder image based on the prompt, and allows saving to the user's profile or downloading the result.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout component with a sticky header, desktop/mobile navigation, user avatar display, and logout functionality using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text messages, photo, and video file attachments with preview, upload progress, and send-on-Enter behavior.
frontend/src/components/MessageList.tsx: Renders a scrollable list of chat messages, distinguishing sent vs. received messages with avatars, timestamps, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Displays a grid of photos from ExternalBlob objects with a lightbox overlay for full-size viewing and loading skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUploader.ts: Photo upload component with file selection, preview, upload progress bar, and integration with the sharePhoto mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/VideoFactsCarous: Auto-advancing carousel that displays a set of hardcoded interesting facts with category labels, navigation dots, and animated transitions.
frontend/src/components/VideoGallery.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of video players from ExternalBlob objects with loading skeleton states and an empty state placeholder.
frontend/src/components/VideoGenerator.t: A UI component that simulates AI video generation from a text prompt, displaying a placeholder thumbnail with progress animation, and allows saving or downloading the result.
frontend/src/components/VideoUploader.ts: A file upload component that lets users select a local video file, preview it, and upload it via the shareVideo mutation with progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all TanStack Query hooks for backend interactions, covering user profiles, search, contacts, messaging, and video sharing mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a dark neon-themed design system with Tailwind CSS, custom OKLCH color variables, and utility classes for neon glow effects, gradients, and styled inputs/buttons.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Renders a chat interface for a specific contact identified by username, displaying a header with contact info and a message list, but notes a limitation where conversation fetching requires a Principal ID not available from UserProfile.
frontend/src/pages/ContactsPage.tsx: Displays the user's contacts, pending requests, and a search interface (by username or profile number) with add/accept/decline actions, though some operations are limited by the absence of Principal IDs in UserProfile data.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePage.tsx: Provides a tabbed UI for creating content, offering AI-based image and video generation via ImageGenerator/VideoGenerator components and manual media uploads via PhotoUploader/VideoUploader components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard with a personalized welcome banner, quick-action navigation links, contact stats, and a VideoFactsCarousel component.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays the login screen with Internet Identity authentication, featuring the app logo, feature highlight pills, and a sign-in button that triggers the login flow.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows a user's profile (own or another's) with avatar, bio, photo/video galleries, and an edit modal that supports updating display name, bio, and uploading a new profile picture with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration page component that collects username, display name, and bio, validates input, calls the register mutation, and handles logout via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from query strings or hash-based routes, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Orbitron, Inter), neon color tokens, box shadows, border radii, and keyframe animations for the ShareServe dark/neon UI theme.
project_state.json: Project state manifest describing ShareServe's features, architecture, known issues, image requirements, and versioned feature list for build planning.
